title: Authors and Citation
text: Magno R (2024). dataset.json.examples: Dataset-JSON Example Files. R package version 0.0.1, https://rmagno.eu/dataset.json.examples/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dataset.json.examples: Dataset-JSON Example Files},   author = {Ramiro Magno},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {https://rmagno.eu/dataset.json.examples/}, }

title: Dataset-JSON Example Files
text: dataset.json.examples R data package providing set Dataset-JSON files comprising SDTM ADaM datasets. Examples originally DataExchange-DatasetJson/examplesrepository.

title: Dataset-JSON Example Files
text: example_path() returns paths example Dataset-JSON files: Pick specific path dataset name: Examples files come compressed xz format, use unxz() easily create uncompressed copies:
code: library(dataset.json.examples) example_path() #> # A tibble: 43 × 4 #>    name    file            rel_path             abs_path                         #>    <chr>   <chr>           <chr>                <chr>                            #>  1 adadas  adadas.json.xz  adam/adadas.json.xz  /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  2 adae    adae.json.xz    adam/adae.json.xz    /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  3 adcibc  adcibc.json.xz  adam/adcibc.json.xz  /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  4 adlbc   adlbc.json.xz   adam/adlbc.json.xz   /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  5 adlbcpv adlbcpv.json.xz adam/adlbcpv.json.xz /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  6 adlbh   adlbh.json.xz   adam/adlbh.json.xz   /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  7 adlbhpv adlbhpv.json.xz adam/adlbhpv.json.xz /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  8 adlbhy  adlbhy.json.xz  adam/adlbhy.json.xz  /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #>  9 adnpix  adnpix.json.xz  adam/adnpix.json.xz  /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #> 10 adsl    adsl.json.xz    adam/adsl.json.xz    /home/rmagno/R/x86_64-pc-linux-… #> # ℹ 33 more rows example_path("adsl") unxz(from = example_path("ae"), to = "ae.json")

title: dataset.json.examples: Dataset-JSON Example Files — dataset.json.examples-package
text: R data package providing set Dataset-JSON files comprising SDTM ADaM datasets. Examples originally : https://github.com/cdisc-org/DataExchange-DatasetJson.

title: dataset.json.examples: Dataset-JSON Example Files — dataset.json.examples-package
text: Maintainer: Ramiro Magno rmagno@pattern.institute (ORCID) contributors: Pattern Institute [copyright holder, funder]

title: Dataset-JSON example file path — example_path
text: example_path() retrieves local path bundled Dataset-JSON example files. files compressed xz.

title: Dataset-JSON example file path — example_path
text: name name Dataset-JSON example. Run example_path() check available options, e.g. example_path("ae").

title: Dataset-JSON example file path — example_path
text: character vector absolute paths Dataset-JSON example files.

title: Uncompress xz — unxz
text: unxz() decompresses xz file new file.

title: Uncompress xz — unxz
text: path xz file. path new file (uncompressed).

title: Uncompress xz — unxz
text: function ran side effect creating new file returns path, .e. .

title: Uncompress xz — unxz
code: newfile <- file.path(tempdir(), "ae.json") unxz(from = example_path("ae"), to = newfile) #> $`/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/dataset.json.examples/examples/sdtm/ae.json.xz` #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpvgSlwv/ae.json" #>
